DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine outcomes treat epidemic keratoconjunctivitis 2 % povidone-iodine .
DOC.detailed_description: The study design prospective interventional case series . Our institutional ethical committee approve study protocol April 2004 . We perform study July 2004 December 2009 . During period , 2 episode EKC epidemic . The first episode 2006 second 2009 .
DOC.criteria: patient diagnose EKC outpatient ophthalmic unit child young six year woman pregnant lactation history allergy povidoneiodine prior ocular surgery contact lens usage chronic eye diseases current eye medication .
